verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David. A Song.) Let <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> let His <S%H340>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered;<s%> And let those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> Him <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Him.

As <S%H6227>smoke<s%> is <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H5086>away,<s%> [so] <S%H5086>drive<s%> [them] <S%H5086>away;<s%> As <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H4549>melts<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> [So] let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> perish <S%H6>before<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440>God.<s%>
But let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H8055>glad;<s%> let them <S%H5970>exult<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> Yes, let them <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness.<s%>

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to His <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H5549>Lift<s%> up [a song] for Him who <S%H7392>rides<s%> through the <S%H6160>deserts,<s%> Whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3050>Lord,<s%> and <S%H5937>exult<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him.
A father of the <S%H1>fatherless<s%> and a <S%H3490>judge<s%> for the <S%H1781>widows,<s%> Is <S%H490>God<s%> in His <S%H430>holy<s%> <S%H6944>habitation.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>makes<s%> a <S%H1004>home<s%> for the <S%H3173>lonely;<s%> He <S%H3318>leads<s%> out the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> into <S%H3574>prosperity,<s%> <S%H389>Only<s%> the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in a <S%H6707>parched<s%> <S%H6707>land.<s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> when Thou didst <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> When Thou didst <S%H6805>march<s%> through the <S%H3452>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>quaked;<s%> The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H5197>dropped<s%> [rain] at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> <S%H2088>itself<s%> [quaked] at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thou didst <S%H5130>shed<s%> <S%H5130>abroad<s%> a <S%H5071>plentiful<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> Thou didst <S%H3559>confirm<s%> Thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> when it was <S%H3811>parched.<s%>
Thy <S%H9130>creatures<s%> <S%H3427>settled<s%> in it; Thou didst <S%H3559>provide<s%> in Thy <S%H9186>goodness<s%> for the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> O <S%H430>God.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> the <S%H561>command;<s%> The women who <S%H1319>proclaim<s%> the [good] <S%H1319>tidings<s%> are a <S%H7227>great<s%> host: <S%H6635><s%>

<S%H4428>"Kings<s%> of <S%H6635>armies<s%> <S%H5074>flee,<s%> they <S%H5074>flee,<s%> And she <S%H9317>who<s%> <S%H9317>remains<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> will <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil!<s%>"

<S%H518>When<s%> you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H9630>sheepfolds,<s%> [You are like] the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H2645>covered<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> And its <S%H84>pinions<s%> with <S%H3422>glistening<s%> <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
When the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6566>scattered<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> there, It was <S%H7949>snowing<s%> in <S%H6756>Zalmon.<s%>

A <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan;<s%> A <S%H2022>mountain<s%> [of many] <S%H1386>peaks<s%> is the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> do you <S%H7520>look<s%> with <S%H7520>envy,<s%> O <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with [many] <S%H1386>peaks,<s%> At the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2530>desired<s%> for His <S%H3427>abode<s%>? <S%H637>Surely,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> [there] <S%H5331>forever.<s%>

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H7239>myriads,<s%> <S%H8136>thousands<s%> upon <S%H505>thousands;<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is among them [as at] <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H5927>ascended<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> Thou hast <S%H7617>led<s%> <S%H7617>captive<s%> [Thy] <S%H7628>captives;<s%> Thou hast <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%> among <S%H120>men,<s%> Even [among] the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H637>also,<s%> that the <S%H3050>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> [there.]
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> who <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H6006>bears<s%> our <S%H6006>burden,<s%> The <S%H410>God<s%> [who] is our <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H410>God<s%> is to us a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H4190>deliverances;<s%> And to <S%H3068>God<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> belong <S%H8444>escapes<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>

<S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4272>shatter<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of His <S%H340>enemies,<s%> The <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H6936>crown<s%> of him who <S%H1980>goes<s%> on in his <S%H817>guilty<s%> <S%H817>deeds.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> [them] <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%> I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> [them] <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%>

That your <S%H7272>foot<s%> may <S%H4272>shatter<s%> [them] in <S%H1818>blood,<s%> The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of your <S%H3611>dogs<s%> [may have] its <S%H4521>portion<s%> from [your] <S%H340>enemies.<s%> "
They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> Thy <S%H1979>procession,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> The <S%H1979>procession<s%> of my <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H4428>King,<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

The <S%H7891>singers<s%> <S%H6923>went<s%> on, the <S%H5059>musicians<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> [them], In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5959>maidens<s%> <S%H8608>beating<s%> <S%H8608>tambourines.<s%>
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4721>congregations,<s%> [Even] the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [you who are] of the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> is <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> the <S%H6810>youngest,<s%> <S%H7287>ruling<s%> them, The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> [in] their <S%H7277>throng,<s%> The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
Your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H5797>strength;<s%> <S%H5810>Show<s%> Thyself <S%H5810>strong,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2098>who<s%> hast <S%H6466>acted<s%> on our behalf.
<S%H4480>Because<s%> of Thy <S%H1964>temple<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H4428>Kings<s%> will <S%H2986>bring<s%> <S%H7862>gifts<s%> to Thee.

<S%H1605>Rebuke<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> in the <S%H7070>reeds,<s%> The <S%H5712>herd<s%> of <S%H47>bulls<s%> with the <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H7511>Trampling<s%> under <S%H7511>foot<s%> the <S%H7518>pieces<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> He has <S%H967>scattered<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> who <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H7128>war.<s%>
<S%H2831>Envoys<s%> will <S%H857>come<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> will <S%H7323>quickly<s%> <S%H7323>stretch<s%> out her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H2167>Sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

To Him who <S%H7392>rides<s%> upon the <S%H8064>highest<s%> <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> which are from <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H6924>times;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> He <S%H5414>speaks<s%> <S%H5414>forth<s%> with His <S%H6963>voice,<s%> a <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
<S%H5414>Ascribe<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> to <S%H430>God;<s%> His <S%H1346>majesty<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> And His <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> [Thou art] <S%H3372>awesome<s%> from Thy <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%> The <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1931>Himself<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8592>power<s%> to the <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H430>God!<s%>
